title: [Large-Scale] Case-Based Simulation Training for Enhancing Mammography Interpretation Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in diagnostic imaging and experience in digital image analysis
context.additional_context: Digital learning environments for advanced professional managers/leaders, focusing on practical implementation

learning_goals: Learners can identify microcalcifications and masses in mammography images with 90% or higher accuracy
Learners can complete diagnostic reports within 15 minutes following standard interpretation protocols
Learners can mark lesion locations and classify grades with 85% concordance with expert interpretations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
